item.title: Repost from ANCALERTS https://twitter.com/ANCALERTS/statuses/1097118320212361216/:
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Repost from ANCALERTS https://twitter.com/ANCALERTS/statuses/1097118320212361216/:

@alvinelchico @iamkarendavila #Harapan2019 Gutoc: Books not bullets, Teachers, not terrorists. We need to have no tanks anymore. We need schools. Ang ating i-address sa Pilipinas ay kahirapan.

LIVE: https://news.abs-cbn.com/halalan2019
